text:
Pair Shaped Inc. | Front-end-developer | 2 Month Contract (Immediate) | REMOTE

Looking for someone to build out the front-end of a Ruby on Rails based marketplace application. Mostly CSS and HTML work, and some light JS work, but open to React, Vue, Angular, and others if there's a convincing argument for it.

Expertise in Rails and Slim / Jade / Haml a bonus.

You will be working with a back-end dev. Work will be done on branches and PR'd (on Github).

Contact: dave at pairshaped dot ca
